sentence.Network_en: Love is the antithesis of selfishness.
The company represented the antithesis of everything he admired.
sentence.Network_cn: 那家公司与他所崇尚的一切完全相反.

sentence.Network_en: Smallness is the antithesis of largeness.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 用了对照( antithesis) 修辞手段。第一句中的United与第二句中的Divided 形成对比，后一句的Little wecan do 与前一句中的little we c.
例10）运用了对偶 (antithesis) 和尾韵 (rhyme) 的修辞格，在翻译处理时运用四字格，两两相对，同样具有语言的美感。例11）运用的 …
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... antipathy 反感 antithesis 对立；反论 antibacterial 抗菌的.
2012年自考英语（二）大纲词汇表二 - 自考365 ... ant：n. 蚂蚁 antithesis：n. 对欧，（修辞学）对句，对立，对立面 antiwar：a. 反 …

list.abs: antisymmetrical state 反对称态antithesis concept 对偶概念-

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (originally denoting the substitution of one grammatical case for another): from late Latin, from Greek antitithenai 'set against', from anti 'against' + tithenai 'to place'. The earliest current sense, denoting a rhetorical or literary device, dates from the early 16th cent

entry.tran: 对立面；形成对立（或对照）的事物
entry.def: The antithesis of something is its exact opposite.

example.ex: The little black dress is the anithesis of fussy dressing.
example.tran: 与花哨的打扮形成鲜明对比的是这件小黑裙子。

entry.def: If there is an antithesis between two things, there is a contrast between them.

sentences.sentence: "his theory is the antithesis of mine"

means.word_mean: 2. the juxtaposition of contrasting words or ideas to give a feeling of balance

auth_sentence.content: It was the antithesis of an elite baseball team.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was the antithesis of an elite baseball team.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was the antithesis of an elite baseball team.

auth_sentence.content: Graham Mackay is the antithesis of the hot-headed businessman.
auth_sentence.res_content: Graham Mackay is the antithesis of the hot-headed businessman.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Graham Mackay is the antithesis of the hot-headed businessman.

auth_sentence.content: Is Elliot Morely the visual antithesis of Geoff Holhurst?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is Elliot Morely the visual antithesis of Geoff Holhurst?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is Elliot Morely the visual antithesis of Geoff Holhurst?

stems_affixes.type_exp: =to put,place,表示"放,引申为论文,观点"

stems_affixes.word_buile: hypo下面+thesis论文→还不是正式的理论→假说
par平行+en进+thesis放→平行放进去→括号
thesis放,引申为论文,观点→放好的研究主题
